OLS_Regression.interpretability: High - coefficients show direct feature impact

key_differences.target_variables: OLS predicts continuous risk (0-1), ANN predicts binary disease (0/1)
key_differences.performance_metrics: OLS uses R²/RMSE, ANN uses accuracy/precision/recall
key_differences.model_complexity: OLS is linear and interpretable, ANN is non-linear and complex
key_differences.overfitting_risk: OLS shows potential overfitting (R²=0.9999), ANN more reasonable (71% accuracy)

recommendations.use_ols_when: Need interpretable model, continuous risk assessment, feature importance analysis
recommendations.use_ann_when: Need binary classification, can accept black box, have large datasets
recommendations.concerns: OLS R² of 0.9999 suggests overfitting or data leakage - investigate risk_score calculation
